ca.ualberta.t14.gametrader

Class GameController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.t14.gametrader.GameController

  • public class GameController
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the Controller class for EditInventoryItemActivity. It provides methods to take input and make changes to the Game model.

    • Method Detail

      • createGame

        public Game createGame(User user)
        Creates a new game with given user and adds that created game into the user's inventory. To be used when user wants to create a game.
        Parameters:
        user - the user that receives the new game item.
        Returns:
        the Game object reference that was also passed into te inventory.

      • isOwner

        public java.lang.Boolean isOwner(Game game,
                        User user)
        Determines if the user given is the owner of that given game.
        Parameters:
        game - the game object to check ownership
        user - user to check against
        Returns:
        a boolean if the given user is the owner of the game or not.

      • editGame

        public void editGame(Game game,
            java.lang.String title,
            Game.Platform platform,
            Game.Condition condition,
            java.lang.Boolean sharableStatus,
            java.lang.String additionalInfo)
        It will update the Game's model with the new input received from the user.
        Parameters:
        game - The game that is to be updated.
        title - A new title for the Game.
        platform - A new platform for the Game.
        condition - A new condition for the Game.
        sharableStatus - Change sharable status to either Public or Private
        additionalInfo - New additional information for the game.

      • setPreviewImage

        public Bitmap setPreviewImage(java.lang.String imageId,
                     Context context)
        This will return a Bitmap, the image-json on file that should be shown must pass it's imageID here.
        Parameters:
        imageId - the image id of image to show.
        context - the application's context.
        Returns:
        a Bitmap of that image.

      • setPreviewUriImage

        public Bitmap setPreviewUriImage(Uri uri,
                        ContentResolver contentResolver)
        This will return a Bitmap after it resolved the given Uri to Bitmap.
        Parameters:
        uri - the uri containing the path to an image
        contentResolver - activitie's content resolver
        Returns:
        Bitmap of uri image

      • addPhoto

        public java.lang.Boolean addPhoto(Game game,
                         Uri uri,
                         ContentResolver contentResolver,
                         Context context)
        Given game, it will add the uri containing a bitmap to the game.
        Parameters:
        game - the game to receive the image.
        uri - the URI of the image to be added to the game.
        contentResolver - is the contentResolver from the activitie's getContentResolver();
        Returns:
        returns false if the Bitmap supplied is invalid: has a height or width of 0;

      • removePhotos

        public java.lang.Boolean removePhotos(Game game,
                             java.lang.String imageId,
                             Context context)
        Given game, this will remove an image from the game, as well add it to the removal list so it will be removed from the database as well.
        Parameters:
        game - the game containing the image.
        imageId - the ID of the image
        context - the context of the application
        Returns:
        a Boolean of whether the image was removed or not

      • updateTemporaryImageBox

        public void updateTemporaryImageBox(ImageButton imgBtn,
                           java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> imageIds,
                           java.util.ArrayList<Uri> uriList,
                           Context context,
                           ContentResolver content,
                           Activity activity)
        This updates the temporary image box preview of the image in the activity. These images are not actually in the game They are preview of what would be added to the game. If all images are removed it will display the "no photos" image.
        Parameters:
        imgBtn - The image button that should contain the preview image
        imageIds - a list of imageIds that might become the preview.
        uriList - a list of Uri containing an image that might become the preview
        context - the context of the application.
        content - the contentResolver of the application.
        activity - the activity.

      • removeGame

        public void removeGame(Game game,
              User user,
              Context context)
        Removes specified game from the given user's inventory.
        Parameters:
        game - the game to be removed
        user - the user who's inventory he game is to be deleted from.
